assessment_item.subject: Botany
assessment_item.title: LC4VMA-Q13-கீழ்காண்பவைகளில் கிளைக்காலைசிஸ் பற்றி தவறானது எது?
assessment_item.body:
{"data":{"plugin":{"id":"org.ekstep.questionunit.mcq","version":"1.1","templateId":"horizontalMCQ"},"data":{"question":{"text":"

கீழ்காண்பவைகளில் கிளைக்காலைசிஸ் பற்றி தவறானது எது?

","image":"","audio":"","audioName":"","hint":""},"options":[{"text":"

 ATP-யை பயன்படுத்தப்படுகிறது                       

","image":"","audio":"","audioName":"","hint":"","isCorrect":false,"$$hashKey":"object:1858"},{"text":"

 ATP-ஐ உற்பத்தி செய்கிறது

","image":"","audio":"","audioName":"","hint":"","isCorrect":false,"$$hashKey":"object:1859"},{"text":"

இறுதியாக  CO_2 மற்றும் H_2O - உருவாகிறது

","image":"","audio":"","audioName":"","isCorrect":true,"$$hashKey":"object:1989"},{"text":"

NADH\\left(H^+\\right) உற்பத்தியாகிறது

","image":"","audio":"","audioName":"","isCorrect":false,"$$hashKey":"object:1994"}],"questionCount":0,"media":[]},"config":{"metadata":{"max_score":1,"isShuffleOption":true,"isPartialScore":true,"templateType":"Horizontal","name":"LC4VMA-Q13-கீழ்காண்பவைகளில் கிளைக்காலைசிஸ் பற்றி தவறானது எது?","title":"LC4VMA-Q13-கீழ்காண்பவைகளில் கிளைக்காலைசிஸ் பற்றி தவறானது எது?","board":"State (Tamil Nadu)","medium":"Tamil","gradeLevel":["Class 11"],"subject":"Botany","qlevel":"MEDIUM","contentType":"Resource","mimeType":"application/vnd.ekstep.ecml-archive","category":"MCQ"},"max_time":0,"max_score":1,"partial_scoring":true,"layout":"Horizontal","isShuffleOption":true,"questionCount":1},"media":[]}}
